Package com.kneelawk.graphlib.graph.simple

Class SimpleBlockGraphController

java.lang.Object
com.kneelawk.graphlib.graph.simple.SimpleBlockGraphController
All Implemented Interfaces:
BlockGraphController, NodeView, AutoCloseable
public class SimpleBlockGraphController extends Object implements AutoCloseable, NodeView, BlockGraphController
Holds and manages all block graphs for a given world.

This is the default implementation and will likely be the only implementation. I decided to extract the intentional API methods to an interface so that I could have more control over what methods were being called and to open up the possibility of maybe eventually making a cubic-chunks implementation of GraphLib or something.

    • removeEmptyGraphs

      public int removeEmptyGraphs()
      Called by the /graphlib removeemptygraphs command.

      Removes all empty graphs. Graphs should never be empty, but it could theoretically happen if a mod isn't using GraphLib correctly.

      Specified by:
      removeEmptyGraphs in interface BlockGraphController
      Returns:
      the number of empty graphs removed.
